ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Falchion, EBM, or YK?
ygData.msgSnippet: I dunno.  Personally (since I m not a tank-bard) I would stick with the mace and falchion ;)  It looks spiffier ;)  But... dmg wise?  I d replace the mace with
ygData.messageBody:
I dunno. Personally (since I'm not a tank-bard) I would stick with the mace
and falchion ;) It looks spiffier ;) But... dmg wise? I'd replace the
mace with the Y'kesha. It, theoretically speaking, should do more dmg that
way.

~ L

Try both, parse your log files and see which works better for you ;)
----- Original Message -----
From: "Marc Allie" <marcallie@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, April 03, 2000 1:45 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Falchion, EBM, or YK?


> I recently was given a Ykesha by a friend who felt sorry
> for me after I camped the Frenzied ghoul for 19 hours with
> no luck. :) My previous weapons were a Runed Falchion in
> primary and a Enamelled Black mace in secondary.
>
> Which should I replce with the YK? I am leaning towards YK
> in primary and EBM in secondary, but I realize the Falchion has
> a much better ratio than the Mace, and perhaps I should indeed
> go Falchion / YK.
>
> Any thoughts? Don't take solely the YK proc factor into account, I
> am an AC buff and my DEX is only 114, so proc is usually just gravy,
> not to be counted on. Am I right, will the YK / EBM do better for me?
>
> Pistov Kazidaizahlot
> 40th Bard of Cazic Thule
> "Can I swing a res?"
>
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
